p.k: Horror, Sci-fi, Thriller Usa (1968). Hrají: A.C. McDonald, Charles Craig, Duane Jones, Frank Doak, George Kosana, Judith O'Dea, Judith Ridley, Karl Hardman, Keith Wayne, Kyra Schon, Marilyn Eastman, Mark Ricci, Samuel R. Solito. Režie: George A. Romero.
p.d: A group of people hide from bloodthirsty zombies in a farmhouse.
